ti:edition.ti:label: πρὸς Πολυκλέα περὶ τοῦ ἐπιτριηραρχήματος
ti:edition.ti:description: Demosthenis. Orationes. Vol. III. Rennie, W., editor. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1931.

ti:translation.ti:label: Apollodorus Against Polycles for Expenses Incurred while Serving as Trierarch
